channel.title: Server on Hi, I'm Kyle
channel.description: Recent content in Server on Hi, I'm Kyle

item.title: Setting Up A New Ubuntu Linux Server
item.description: I have plans to start a second open source project that will need a server so over the past few days I re-purposed an old Windows laptop into a server running Ubuntu Linux. The installation was a little tricky because after I downloaded the Ubuntu installation file, I discovered that the DVD burner on this old laptop was no longer working. Instead, I needed to create a bootable USB. Rufus is a great utility that made this very fast and easy.
